name: Ann
text: Very impressed with Bellhouse Excavating. They did a great job digging my pond and refreshing the gravel driveway. Incredible customer service going beyond what was expected. Highly recommend this business.

name: M C
text: They did a great job for the excavation and backfill of our addition renovation. We have no complaints.

name: Jane
text: These guys are professionals!  They show up on time, quote the scope of work and get it done.  Everything was handled by Darryl and his guys and they worked until the job was completed to our satisfaction.  No skipping out early for these guys.
